    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionInstance

        public ConnectionInstance(NetworkManager mgr)

    • Method Detail

      • getNetwork

        public NetworkManager getNetwork()
        Retrieves the associated NetworkManager
        Returns:
        The associated NetworkManager;

      • unregisterAll

        public java.lang.String[] unregisterAll()
        Removes all channels and handlers from the registration.
        Returns:
        An array of channels that were in the registration If the connection is still active, you should send UNREGISTER messages for these.

      • registerChannel

        public boolean registerChannel(IPacketHandler handler,
                               java.lang.String channel)
        Registers a channel to a specific handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to register
        channel - The channel to register on
        Returns:
        True if the channel was not previously registered to any handlers. If True, the connection is still active, and this is not the OnLogin event, you should send a REGISTER command for this channel.

      • unregisterChannel

        public boolean unregisterChannel(IPacketHandler handler,
                                 java.lang.String channel)
        Unregisters a channel from the specified handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to remove the channel from.
        channel - The channel to remove from the handler registration.
        Returns:
        True if this was the last handler registered with the specified channel. If this is the case, and the network connection is still alive, you should send a UNREGISTER message for this channel.

      • unregisterHandler

        public java.lang.String[] unregisterHandler(IPacketHandler handler)
        Unregisters a handler from all of it's associated channels.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to unregister
        Returns:
        A list of channels that now have no handlers. If the connection is still active, you should send a UNREGISTER message for each channel in this list.

      • getRegisteredChannels

        public java.lang.String[] getRegisteredChannels()
        Retrieves a list of all unique channels that currently have valid handlers.
        Returns:
        The channel list

      • getChannelHandlers

        public IPacketHandler[] getChannelHandlers(java.lang.String channel)
        Retrieves a list of all handlers currently registered to the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to get the handlers for.
        Returns:
        A array containing all handlers for this channel.

      • addActiveChannel

        public void addActiveChannel(java.lang.String channel)
        Adds a channel to the active set. This is a set that the other end of the connection has registered a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel name

      • removeActiveChannel

        public void removeActiveChannel(java.lang.String channel)
        Removes a channel from the active set. This should be done with the other end of the connection unregisters a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel -

      • isActiveChannel

        public boolean isActiveChannel(java.lang.String channel)
        Checks if the specified channel is registered as active by the other end of the connection.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to check
        Returns:
        True if it's active, false otherwise.
